# HELP tikv_allocator_stats Allocator stats
# TYPE tikv_allocator_stats gauge
tikv_allocator_stats{type="active"} 648630272
tikv_allocator_stats{type="allocated"} 640963360
tikv_allocator_stats{type="dirty"} 297072
tikv_allocator_stats{type="fragmentation"} 7666912
tikv_allocator_stats{type="mapped"} 716767232
tikv_allocator_stats{type="metadata"} 11016080
tikv_allocator_stats{type="resident"} 659943424
tikv_allocator_stats{type="retained"} 241631232
